content.question: <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math> <math alttext="6"><mn>6</mn></math> <math alttext="7"><mn>7</mn></math> <math alttext="8"><mn>8</mn></math> <math alttext="9"><mn>9</mn></math> <math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses"><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced></math> <math alttext="negative 3"><mo>-</mo><mn>3</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 1"><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></math> <math alttext="negative 1 third"><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></math> <math alttext="negative 1 over 9"><mo>-</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>9</mn></mfrac></math> Values for an exponential function <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> are given in the table at selected values of <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>. Based on this information, which of the following describes <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always decreasing, and the graph of <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always concave up.
<math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always decreasing, and the graph of <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always concave down.
<math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always increasing, and the graph of <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always concave up.
<math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always increasing, and the graph of <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always concave down.

content.answer: <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always increasing, and the graph of <math alttext="k"><mi>k</mi></math> is always concave down.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
